results.content:
This course is interesting and with many examples so it's possible to understand how to apply theory with practical examples. By the way, it's sometimes hard to follow because the instructor makes errors and it's difficult to understand what is happening. The good point is that the instructor corrects the error in realtime so you can see why it doesn't work. 
Thank you for this course :-).

response.content: Hey man, thanks for your superb review. It would be cool if you suggest something else you want to learn. I will make a course on that also. Keep learning
response.content_html: Hey man, thanks for your superb review. It would be cool if you suggest something else you want to learn. I will make a course on that also. Keep learning
